<base target="_parent">

```{r}
tryCatch(
    plot_timeseries(
        csv_tv  = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/marinebon/info-mb/master/prep/data/fish/FED_Rockfish_Forage_Catch_ALL_year_sums.csv",
        title   = "Forage & Rockfish (YOY adults and unknown) Abundance",
        y_label = "Catch",
        skip    = 0,
        filter  = NULL,
        col_t   = "year",
        col_y   = "catch",
        group_by= NULL
    ),
    error = function(e) e
)
```
